exercises.name: Push-ups
exercises.instructions: Start in a plank position with hands shoulder-width apart. Lower your body until chest nearly touches the floor, then push back up.

exercises.name: Squats
exercises.instructions: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart. Lower your hips back and down as if sitting in a chair, keeping chest up. Return to standing.

exercises.name: Plank
exercises.instructions: Hold a push-up position with body in a straight line from head to heels. Engage core and hold.

exercises.name: Lunges
exercises.instructions: Step forward with one leg, lowering hips until both knees are bent at 90 degrees. Push back to start and repeat.

exercises.name: Mountain Climbers
exercises.instructions: Start in plank position. Quickly alternate bringing knees to chest in a running motion.

exercises.name: Burpees
exercises.instructions: From standing, drop into squat, kick feet back to plank, do a push-up, jump feet to hands, and jump up.

exercises.name: Sit-ups
exercises.instructions: Lie on back with knees bent. Lift torso up toward knees, then lower back down with control.

exercises.name: Jumping Jacks
exercises.instructions: Jump feet apart while raising arms overhead. Jump feet together while lowering arms to sides.

exercises.name: Tricep Dips
exercises.instructions: Using a chair or bench, lower body by bending elbows, then push back up.

exercises.name: Wall Sit
exercises.instructions: Lean against wall and slide down until thighs are parallel to ground. Hold position.

exercises.name: Child's Pose
exercises.instructions: Kneel and sit back on heels. Extend arms forward and lower chest to ground. Breathe deeply.

exercises.name: Cat-Cow Stretch
exercises.instructions: On hands and knees, alternate arching back (cat) and dropping belly (cow) while breathing.
